description: This file sets up a knowledge base from a CSV URL, initializes an agent with this knowledge, and performs a query to retrieve information about employee salaries in the Marketing department.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base to answer queries.

classes.name: CSVUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads data from a CSV URL.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
